me.shoutto.sdk

Class CreateShoutRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.shoutto.sdk.CreateShoutRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StmEntityActionRequest

    public class CreateShoutRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements StmEntityActionRequest
    The data object that contains information about a new shout to be created.
